column1: Ferdinand Took was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Ferdinand was the son of Sigismond Took. He was the father of Ferdibrand Took. They both attended Bilbo Baggins Bilbos Farewell Party in .
The name is composed of ferdi "peace" + nand "daring
Wikipedia gives the etymology frith "protection"/ far√∞ "journey" and nanth
